Stage 0.Objectives: Decompose input information into an ordered sequence of logical steps to derive an initial outcome.

Stage 1.Objectives: Iteratively evaluate and modify an existing artifact using defined criteria to progressively enhance its quality attributes such as clarity, consistency, and completeness.
